content: the back only for the shaping of the neck we begin already in the row 77 and after shaping of the neck we crochet withou decreasing to the row 92 where we fasten_off sleeves make 2 for one sleeve we make 14 motifs and 2 halfmotifs which we joied togehter vis schema nr 4 1 row 5 motifs joind in the ring 2 row 4 motifs and 1 halfmotif 3 row 3 motifs 4 row 2 motifs and 1 halfmotif finishing sew shoulder seams sew sleeve seams and set in sleeves neck edg trim with right side facing join the yarn with sl in back neck and work single_crochet evenly spaced around the neck edge and them work 1 row of clusters *single_crochet skip 2 single_crochet 5 double_crochet in one stich skip single_crochet from * repeat across the whole row fasten_off weave carefully all loose ends schema nr 1 - motif schema nr 2 + 3 halfmotif + lace part schema nr 4 - sleeve střih
